title: Manage an ISPS Security Level Change
description: The national authority raises the security level for all ports. The PFSO must implement heightened security measures.

tasks.description: Receive the official notification from the government to raise the ISPS Security Level from 1 to 2.
Implement the pre-planned security measures for Level 2, such as increasing patrols and conducting more frequent ID checks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PFSO issues instructions to the security team to implement the new measures.

tasks.description: Notify all port users and vessels of the change in security level.
tasks.expected_outcome: An alert is broadcast across the port, and signage is updated.
